name: The Final Days: Blood Dawn
description:
The Final Days 2: Blood Dawn

The sequel of The Final Days.
Game/virtual novel, follow the story and make choices that will kill/save others and yourself. Is all about taking realistic choices based on your own morals and ideas.
Dumb choices may end in fatal consequences for you and/or those around you.
But at the end of the day... is your life, your call.

Following the events of the first The Final Days, the survivor(you) continue his/her fight to stay alive. More choices, more ways to survive and more ways to die.

Who can you trust?
Can you unlock the secret behind the apocalypse.

You are no super hero... no elite soldier... you are a survivor...
